consoleDefaultText:
Welcome to Lisk Decrypt!
A Decrypt/Encrypt tool build Lisk SDK and Lisk Elements created by delegate anonimowy891.

New user:
1: Click on create account to generate a new passphrase.
2: Save the passphrase somewhere and click on the Login button.
3: Click initialize to receive LSN tokens.
4: Paste recipient adress, write message and send.
